title: Gadget Gizmo (E-commerce project)
bullets: Designed and developed RESTful APIs for a microservices-based Java backend using Spring Boot, integrated with MongoDB and GCP Cloud Storage to support e-commerce operations.
Implemented secure authentication using Spring Security and JWT tokens.
Ensured code quality with Test-Driven Development (TDD) using JUnit and Mockito.
Automated CI/CD using Jenkins to deploy containers on GKE.

title: Identification of Ayurvedic leaves using Deep Learning
bullets: Developed an Android application to scan and identify various types of Ayurvedic leaves.
The algorithm used was CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) and the model had an accuracy of 94. 10 %.

title: Emergency Medical Service
bullets: Developed a location enabled android application, which helps victims get help in any kind of any emergency (medical/police).
Provides responder with necessary data like location, situation of victim with GPS and images.
